title: NATO must be ready to respond to hybrid threats, top commander says
description: MONS, Belgium, Dec 4 (Reuters) - NATO must be ready to respond to increasing hybrid threats in order to defend its member states' territory, the alliance's top military commander said on Thursday. Read full story
content:
